item.title: The Inception
item.description: We have embarked on the journey! After purchasing a go kart fitted with a KT100 from the staff at Brew Dog, we have started work fitting servos to allow for remote operation. The first step is converting the current kart into something we can control remotely. We will then utilise this as a base for the self driving platform.

item.title: About
item.description: Who we are We are three mates from The Queensland University of Technology with a passion for robotics and autonomous systems. Follow our journey of developing a self driving go kart and more here. John Hatfield Mechatronics & Computer Science Student Undergraduate Engineer LinkedIn johnh@hattech.com.au 0409 164 870 Alistair English Mechatronics & Computer Science Student Undergraduate Software Engineer LinkedIn alistairsenglish@gmail.com Matthew Bevan Mechatronics & Computer Science Student Bar Manager Spends spare time building cool sh*t.
